(OOC): Hello.

For the past week, my internet has been offline.  This was, though it may be
hard to believe, directly after I signed up my character, Anolis, for this.

First of all, I need the address for the Neo Beast Wars RPG website, as I was
unable to bookmark it.

Also, if anyone is willing, could someone give me a summary of what happened?
I have a total of 1,024 messages, and that was only as of about 10 minutes
ago.  If somebody could write up a summary for me, I would be forever in their
debt.

Thank you.

Inferno731@... wrote:

> teleportation is not illegal it only is if you constantly use it. there are
